text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Zephyrus S GX701GW 17.3" FHD 144Hz | 2.6GHz i7-9750H, RTX 2070, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, PCIe 1TB SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Zephyrus S GX701GW 17.3" FHD 144Hz | 2.6GHz i7-9750H, RTX 2070, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, PCIe 1TB SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty!
